reviewText: my father in law, really like it
Nothing in the advertising said all but one movie was in his early days in 1934 and year near then

Happier than I thought I would be.

4 discs with the names of the movies that's on each of them.

Each disc has a menu that lets you choose which movie that you want.

Once you select a movie you can either play movie or scene select.

The quality of the movies are about that of a VHS.
Still have to see the entirety; but John Wayne has a trademark for wholesome movies.
I didn't realize they were the old black& whites from the 1930s & 40s

Some good old great movies form the past when John Wayne was really young, sure the quality was not as good as the new stuff, but they all played well and I enjoy them very much.  As there is not too much good stuff on TV these days it is good to just sit back some times and enjoy some good old movies from the Duke when all the action was real and not digitally enhanced.
great mix of the duke's  movies
